headline: Show HN: I'm writing an MMORPG game for learning programming
description:
Hi, I've been developing an HTML5 MMORPG game where people can submit code to play a game, like collect items, destroy defense towers or kill monsters, etc.. I've been working on this for over 1.5 yrs (all my spare time) and now it's ready for preview, does anyone want to try it out? It's mostly opensource (and the rest will be opensource sooner or later)

Please access it with PC, it's an HTML5 game: https://bytelegend.com/

I really want it to expand to more languages, but right now I've only finished Java part. I wonder if anyone can help me with other languages. Besides, I'm not a good game story designer, but I really really want it to be a game with a fantastic story. Any help will be appreciated.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 我在写一个学习编程的MMORPG游戏
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 我在寫一個學習編程的MMORPG遊戲
description_zh-Hans:
你好，我一直在开发一个HTML5 MMORPG游戏，人们可以提交代码来玩游戏，比如收集物品、摧毁防御塔或杀死怪物等等。I've been working on this for over 1.5 yrs (all my spare time) and now it's ready for preview, does anyone want to try it out? It's mostly opensource (and the rest will be opensource sooner or later)

Please access it with PC, it's an HTML5 game: https://bytelegend.com/

我真的希望它能扩展到更多语言，但现在我只完成了Java部分。我想知道是否有人能在其他语言方面帮助我。此外，我不是一个好的游戏故事设计师，但我真的非常希望它是一个有奇妙故事的游戏。任何帮助都是值得赞赏的。
description_zh-Hant:
你好，我一直在開發一個HTML5 MMORPG遊戲，人們可以提交代碼來玩遊戲，比如收集物品、摧毀防禦塔或殺死怪物等等。I've been working on this for over 1.5 yrs (all my spare time) and now it's ready for preview, does anyone want to try it out? It's mostly opensource (and the rest will be opensource sooner or later)

Please access it with PC, it's an HTML5 game: https://bytelegend.com/

我真的希望它能擴展到更多語言，但現在我只完成了Java部分。我想知道是否有人能在其他語言方面幫助我。此外，我不是一個好的遊戲故事設計師，但我真的非常希望它是一個有奇妙故事的遊戲。任何幫助都是值得讚賞的。
